history.proof: intros l a H_canonical. unfold canonical in H_canonical. destruct H_canonical as [H_olist H_zterm]. split. - srun best use: olist_X. - apply H_zterm.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) eqT_refl := Term.eqT_refl A n : reflexive (Term A n) (eqT (A:=A) (n:=n)) consA := cons : mon n -> list (mon n) -> list (mon n) nilA := nil : list (mon n) listA := list (mon n) : Set DescA := Desc (mon n) ltM : list (mon n) -> Prop l : list (Term A n) a : Term A n H_olist : olist (pX a l) H_zterm : nZterm (pX a l) Unable to unify "olist (pX a l)" with "olist l".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros l a H_canonical. unfold canonical in H_canonical. destruct H_canonical as [H_olist H_zterm]. split. - apply H_olist. - apply H_zterm.
